entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
